Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Garfield
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Garfield, Damen, 47th and Western due to street blockage near Western/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Garfield, Damen, 47th and Western due to street blockage near Western/Garfield.

Allow extra travel time.
